content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 10}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 15, "index": 11}, {"type": "pink_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 19, "index": 15}, {"type": "mojang_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_concrete", "quantity": 19, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 9, "index": 25}, {"type": "light_blue_carpet", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "witch_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 29}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 55, "index": 30}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "polished_andesite_slab", "quantity": 44, "index": 35}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 36}, {"type": "sticky_piston", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 43}, {"type": "fern", "quantity": 51, "index": 44}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft pink_concrete_powder, I first need to craft pink_dye. Pink_dye requires placing a pink_tulip in the crafting table, and the only pink_tulip is in slot 12, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
